mapper.insert: insert into technology.company_room_device (crd_company_id, crd_room_id, crd_device_id, crd_number) values (#{crdCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crdRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crdDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crdNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select crd_id, crd_company_id, crd_room_id, crd_device_id, crd_number from technology.company_room_device
mapper.update:
update technology.company_room_device
crd_company_id = #{crdCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
crd_room_id = #{crdRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
crd_device_id = #{crdDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
crd_number = #{crdNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where crd_id = #{crdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select crd.*, b.*, r.*, d.id as d_id, d.category_id as d_category_id, d.name as d_name, d.total as d_total, d.piece as d_piece, d.remain as d_remain, d.owner as d_owner, d.kind as d_kind, pd.id as pd_id, pd.kind as pd_kind, pd.category_id as pd_category_id, pd.name as pd_name, pd.property as pd_property from technology.company_room_device crd, technology.device d, technology.room r, technology.building b, technology.property_device pd where crd.crd_room_id = r.r_id and r.r_building_id = b.id and crd.crd_device_id = d.id and d.category_id = pd.id and pd.category_id = 0

select crd.*, b.*, r.*, d.id as d_id, d.category_id as d_category_id, d.name as d_name, d.total as d_total, d.piece as d_piece, d.remain as d_remain, d.owner as d_owner, d.kind as d_kind, pd.id as pd_id, pd.kind as pd_kind, pd.category_id as pd_category_id, pd.name as pd_name, pd.property as pd_property from technology.company_room_device crd, technology.device d, technology.room r, technology.building b, technology.property_device pd
and crd.crd_room_id = r.r_id and r.r_building_id = b.id and crd.crd_device_id = d.id and d.category_id = pd.id and pd.category_id = 0
and r.r_name like concat('%', #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and r.r_company_name like concat('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select crd.*, b.*, r.*, d.id as d_id, d.category_id as d_category_id, d.name as d_name, d.total as d_total, d.piece as d_piece, d.remain as d_remain, d.owner as d_owner, d.kind as d_kind, pd.id as pd_id, pd.kind as pd_kind, pd.category_id as pd_category_id, pd.name as pd_name, pd.property as pd_property from technology.company_room_device crd, technology.device d, technology.room r, technology.building b, technology.property_device pd where crd.crd_room_id = r.r_id and r.r_building_id = b.id and crd.crd_device_id = d.id and d.category_id = pd.id and pd.category_id = 0 and crd.crd_room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
